attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Id of the component

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the visibility of the component

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An EL expression that maps to a server-side component instance in a backing bean

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Value of the component that can be either an EL expression or a literal text

attribute.name: converter
attribute.description: An EL expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id

attribute.name: immediate
attribute.description: Boolean value that specifies the lifecycle phase the valueChangeEvents should be processed, when true the events will be fired at "apply request values", if immediate is set to false, valueChangeEvents are fired in "process validations" phase. Default is false

attribute.name: required
attribute.description: Boolean value that makes the component required, default value is false

attribute.name: validator
attribute.description: A method binding EL expression that refers to a method for validating the input

attribute.name: valueChangeListener
attribute.description: A method binding EL expression that refers to a method for handling a value change event

attribute.name: requiredMessage
attribute.description: Message to be displayed when required field validation fails

attribute.name: converterMessage
attribute.description: Message to be displayed when conversion fails

attribute.name: validatorMessage
attribute.description: Message to be displayed when validation fails

attribute.name: accesskey
attribute.description: Html accesskey attribute of the input text

attribute.name: alt
attribute.description: Html alt attribute of the input text

attribute.name: dir
attribute.description: Html dir attribute of the input text

attribute.name: disabled
attribute.description: Html disabled attribute of the input text

attribute.name: lang
attribute.description: Html lang attribute of the input text

attribute.name: maxlength
attribute.description: Html maxlength attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onblur
attribute.description: Html onblur attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: Html onchange attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onclick
attribute.description: Html onclick attribute of the input text

attribute.name: ondblclick
attribute.description: Html ondblclick attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onfocus
attribute.description: Html onfocus attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onkeydown
attribute.description: Html onkeydown attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onkeypress
attribute.description: Html onkeypress attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onkeyup
attribute.description: Html onkeyup attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onmousedown
attribute.description: Html onmousedown attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onmousemove
attribute.description: Html onmousemove attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onmouseout
attribute.description: Html onmouseout attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onmouseover
attribute.description: Html onmouseover attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onmouseup
attribute.description: Html onmouseup attribute of the input text

attribute.name: onselect
attribute.description: Html onselect attribute of the input text

attribute.name: readonly
attribute.description: Html readonly attribute of the input text

attribute.name: size
attribute.description: Html size attribute of the input text

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Html style attribute of the input text

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Html class attribute of the input text

attribute.name: tabindex
attribute.description: Html tabindex attribute of the input text

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: Html title attribute of the input text

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Javascript variable name of the wrapped yui widget

attribute.name: minLength
attribute.description: Minimum length of a good password.

attribute.name: inline
attribute.description: Displays feedback inline rather than using a popup.

attribute.name: promptLabel
attribute.description: Label of prompt

attribute.name: level
attribute.description: Level of security

attribute.name: weakLabel
attribute.description: Label of weak password

attribute.name: goodLabel
attribute.description: Label of good password

attribute.name: strongLabel
attribute.description: Label of good password

attribute.name: onshow
attribute.description: Javascript event handler to be executed when password strength indicator is shown.

attribute.name: onhide
attribute.description: Javascript event handler to be executed when password strength indicator is hidden.

attribute.name: autocomplete
attribute.description: Defines if browser should autocomplete the input field.
